DE State & Local Officials

Here you can find the information needed in order to reach your local, state, and federal government officials!

Mayor Dale Cooke

    Military veteran and Dewey Beach homeowner for the last 20 years, these are two small items on Mayor Cooke's long list of accomplishments.

  • Email Me
    • Send a Letter or Stop In:

Learn More

Commissioner Mike Dunmeyer

    Commissioner Dunmeyer is currently the owner of two growing small businesses that serve Sussex County and the surrounding area. Prior to that, Mike was the Executive Director for Ocean Champions, the country's only ocean-focused political organization. Mike brings a diverse background to the role of Commissioner.

    • Send a Letter or Stop In:
      105 Rodney Ave.
      Beach, DE 19971
